name: Stick-Agent: Rescue The World
description:
STORYLINE
Lupin - an excellent agent from MI6 - has entered one of the most dangerous secret missions. His duty is to break the conspiracy of the Red Skull. Red Skull is about to empoison humankind in order to reduce the population on the Earth. Their virus is now appearing from place to place. Lupin has to stop them before things get worse.

In the role of Lupin - who is now undercovering as MrBen, you will have to make a decision to rescue the world, escape from a notorious criminal organization and wipe out all enemies lying in your way. Get ready for the most thrilling stickman adventure of all.

HOW TO PLAY
Think outside the box to solve the unexpected riddles. Let out your creative thinking and use your intelligence to rescue and escape.
- Create your own storyline
- Complete the 4 maps to unlock full Mr.Ben's adventure

GAME FEATURE
- Endless intense but exciting stories
- Multiple and unimagined gameplay
- Simple but lively 2D graphics
- Fun game - Real IQ test

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE NOW! Enjoy the moment in Stick-Agent: Rescue The World
